answers.answer: I also have heat sensations radiating out from my skin all over my body. I don't feel temperature the way other people do. Docs can't make sense of it. It's not menapause. I'm interested in hearing the reply to gustovach.

Hi,How are you?This sensation of heat can be due to peripheral neuropathy. Peripheral neuropathy can occur due to diabetes and B12 deficiency. It can cause burning sensations due to damage to the nerves.Please get her blood sugar levels checked. It could also be due to thyroid dysfunction.
